patthana15.51:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.51:0.3_0: Standing on the bank of the skillful, they apply their fingers.
patthana15.51:1.1_0: An individual with internal ill will doesn’t give rise to the teaching.
patthana15.51:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
patthana15.51:2.1_0: An unskilled in one’s internal, unskillful is not skilled in the ways.
patthana15.51:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
patthana15.51:2.1_3: (This should be expanded as for the previous discourse.)
patthana15.51:3.1_0: The vast permutation series is finished.
